caption.p: Percentage reduction in cell numbers of Candida biofilm on the surface of glass, polypropylene (PP) and polyethylene terephthalate (PET) in the presence of clove and thyme essential oils; *—no statistically significant reduction in comparison to control; I— C. lusitaniae, II— C. krusei, III— C. boidinii, IV— C. famata, V— C. colliculosa, VI— C. parapsilosis, VII— C. tropicalis, VIII— C. pelliculosa, IX— C. rugosa, X— C. albicans.
